All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Generator<BigDecimal>, NonNullGenerator<BigDecimal>, org.databene.commons.Resettable, org.databene.commons.ThreadAware
public abstract class AbstractBigDecimalGenerator
extends AbstractNonNullNumberGenerator<BigDecimal>

Wrapper for a LongGenerator that maps the generated Longs to BigDecimals.

Created: 01.07.2006 17:43:29

Volker Bergmann
